messages.message: Followup question, do we charge for digitization in the converse app? Can someone upload as many documents as they wish for free as long as they never talk to them?

No, we donâ€™t charge for digitisation. Yes folks can upload documents up till the storage limit (1GB for free, 10GB for paid accounts). We are happy to bear the cost of storage and digitisation to minimise friction for usage.
